string-array.name: weapon_fail
string-array.item: "You're embarrassed by your poor showing, but nothing remarkable happens."
"You lose your footing, exposing yourself to your target."
"You lose your combat footing, exposing yourself to your enemies."
"You lose your combat footing, and have difficulty recovering."
"Melee: You get tangled with your enemy and fall over. \n Ranged: You spill your quiver."
"You lose your balance while attacking."
"As you attack your opponent, you begin to fear that they are the superior combatant."
"You miss an attack and gaze upon the chaos of the battle, causing your confidence to falter."
"You lose your grip as you attack."
"Melee: The weapon slips from your hand as you attack. \n Ranged: Your ammunition gets lodged in its container."
"Melee: You lunge past an enemy exposing yourself to his attack. \n Ranged: Your missile startles your allies near your target."
"You attack wildly and lose track of the fight around you."
"Missing what you thought was a critical blow causes you to panic."
"You lose your footing while attacking and fall to the ground bumping your head."
"You lose your footing while attacking and slam your head into the ground."

string-array.name: weapon_fail_sub
string-array.item: "You miss your attack."
"Your target has advantage on their first attack against you next round."
"Your enemies have advantage on their first attack roll against you next round."
"Your enemies have advantage on their attack rolls against you until the end of your next turn."

"Melee: You are knocked prone and your movement is reduced to 0. Your target must succeed a DC 10 dexterity check or they are also knocked prone. \n Ranged: You must pick up arrows individually from the ground using your "environmental interaction", or the "Use an Object" action to nock your bow."
"You fall prone and your movement is reduced to 0."
"Disadvantage on your next attack roll against your target."
"Disadvantage on your next attack roll against any target."
"Roll a DC 10 Dexterity Check, on failure you drop your weapon at your feet."

"Melee: Roll a DC 10 Dexterity Check, on failure you throw your weapon into your enemy's space. DM determines where the item is thrown on large sized or greater creatures. \n Ranged: You must use an action to organize the ammunition in its case before you can make another ranged attack."
"Melee: Enemy you were attacking is able to use their reaction to perform and attack of opportunity. \n Ranged: the target can perform an opportunity attack on any ally within melee range."
"End your turn and move to the bottom of the initiative order at the start of the next round."
"End your current turn and you are surprised until the end of your next turn."

You fall prone. Roll a DC 10 constitution save, on failure you take 1d6 damage and are knocked unconscious for 1 minute or until you receive damage from any source. On success take half damage and you remain conscious.
"You fall prone, take 3d6 damage, and become unconscious for 1 minute or until you receive damage from any source."
